full_summary:
### Optometrist Services Request for Proposal

#### Solicitation Number: 21849-24-0015

#### Publication Date: May 6, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date: June 11, 2024, at 17:00:00

### Description of Requirement

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Pacific Region, is seeking an optometrist to provide essential optometry services to inmates at Mission Institution (Medium) and Mission Institution (Minimum) in British Columbia.

**Objective:** Provide optometry services on an as and when requested basis to inmates, in accordance with CSC's Health Services Policies and Guidelines.

**Deliverables:**

- Provide optometry services to inmates based on requirements determined by the Chief Health Services.

### Contract Period and Option Period

The contract period is from June 1, 2024, to May 31, 2025, with an option to renew for three (03) additional one-year periods.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is not subject to any trade agreements.

### Security Requirements

This contract includes security requirements.

### Bidding Instructions

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The lowest priced compliant bid will be awarded the contract.

### Contracting Authority

Contracting Authority: Amber Hupper
Telephone: 236-380-1379
Fax: 604-870-2444
Email: [Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### About This Solicitation

This solicitation document and associated documents can be downloaded from the Canada buys/tender opportunities website.

### Procurement Assistance Canada

PAC offers free seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.

Note to Bidders: After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days of receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.
